then DateMeNow is the right dating app for you.DateMeNow is an ideal dating site and social networking app for when youâre at work, school, the mall, commuting,travellingâ¦anywhere and everywhere you and your device go!SPECIAL FEATURESâ°  Search results automatically lets you know whoâs aroundâ°  Easy sign-up and import your profile with Facebookâ°  Proximity based search results automatically lets you know whoâs aroundâ°  Buy credits for more fun and personal exposureâ°  Over 20 million flirty single guys and girls are waiting for youâ°  Chat, send flirts, share photos, update your status and announce your current locationâ°  See whoâs âchecked you outââ°  Buy plenty of gifts â°  Keep your personal dating diaryâ°  DateMeNow is for anyone: straight, gay, lesbians, seniors, naughty etc.â°  Control your dating privacy (including the option to hide your proximity to others and your age)â°  Use the handy venue check-in feature and let friends and local singles know where you areâ°  Share your status update like on Facebook, Twitter and Foursquareâ°  â¦and much more!ITâS FREE TO SIGNUP!DateMeNow is an Android dating app and literally means âDate Me Nowâ!Try it now and experience the fun and excitement of having your own personalâDate Managerâ on your phone or tablet!(Newer than Badoo, Skout, Flirtomatic, MeetMoi, POF(Plentyoffish), Zoosk, eharmony, match.com and okCupid)
